body_html:
I was hoping to avoid SWIG and use ctypes with tfcompiled object. IE something like

import ctypes
network = ctypes.cdll.LoadLibrary("compiled.so")
result = ctypes.c_float()
network.runforward(result)
body_text:
I was hoping to avoid SWIG and use ctypes with tfcompiled object. IE something like
import ctypes
network = ctypes.cdll.LoadLibrary("compiled.so")
result = ctypes.c_float()
network.runforward(result)
body:
I was hoping to avoid SWIG and use `ctypes` with tfcompiled object. IE something like

```
import ctypes
network = ctypes.cdll.LoadLibrary("compiled.so")
result = ctypes.c_float()
network.runforward(result)
```
